Packages that use compiler.code
Package
Description
compiler
 
compiler.code
 
  • Classes in compiler.code used by compiler
    Class
    Description
    StringBuilderWrapper
    A wrapper class for StringBuilder that provides additional functionality for generating code.
  • Classes in compiler.code used by compiler.code
    Class
    Description
    AssignNode
    The AssignNode class represents a node in the code that assigns a value to a variable.
    CodeBlockNode
    Composite node: Represents a block of code.
    CodeComponent
    The common interface for all nodes in the code.
    ConditionComponent
    Represents a condition in the GLS language.
    ExprComponent
    The ExprComponent interface represents an arithmetic expression component in the code.
    ForNode
    Represents a 'for' loop node in the compiler's abstract syntax tree.
    IfNode
    Represents an if statement node in the compiler's intermediate representation.
    InputNode
    Represents an input node in the code generation process.
    LabelManager
    Manages the generation and allocation of unique labels for while loops and if statements.
    LabelManager.IfLabels
    Holds the labels for a single if statement.
    LabelManager.WhileLabels
    Holds the labels for a single while loop.
    OutputNode
    Represents an output node in the compiler's code generation phase.
    StringBuilderWrapper
    A wrapper class for StringBuilder that provides additional functionality for generating code.
    VariableManager
    Manages variable declarations using a singleton pattern.
    WhileNode
    Represents a while loop node in the code.
